attributes.action: Andrew Mitchell to be questioned under oath by the Home Affairs Select Committee about what he did actually say to police in Downing Street
attributes.additional_details: The 'Plebgate' affair has gone on too long, and politicians appear to be using attacks on the police to distract us from the events at the gates of Downing Street.  It's time that Andrew Mitchell was made to appear before the Home Affairs select committee and questioned under oath as to what he did actually say to the police officers in Downing Street.
